"Stapler-to-Go": A portable, rechargeable stapler that can be attached to a backpack or belt, allowing you to staple documents on the go without the need for an outlet.
"Staple-less Stapler": A stapler that uses agege instead of staples, allowing for easyge modification and a cleaner workspace.
"Staple-free Stapler": A stapler that uses a magnetic staple holder, allowing for easy removal and reuse of staples.
